name: Bunny Blankey
description:
A little bunny who, in order to protect his young from winter, must break into a blanket factory in order to keep his family warm. When he gets there, he finds that his workers are suffering at the hands of an evil boss, with rats roaming about, locked rooms, and materials scattered everywhere. It's up to you to help the workers, who will ultimately reward you with their blankets.

Collect the rolls of thread and take them to your machines, create your blankets, and defeat the boss.

With the arrow keys you control the menu and after starting the game press P to see the game controls. The game is available for play in the browser. Upcoming updates coming soon!!!
